nodes.documentation: VeChain Giveaway Smart Contract.
nodes.name: Giveaway

nodes.documentation: function getGiveawayStatus returns current status of giveaway
nodes.name: getGiveawayStatus
startGiveaway

nodes.documentation:
function hasPlayed checks if msg.sender has reserved a spot 
@return reserved - if msg.sender has reserved a spot
nodes.name: hasReserved

nodes.documentation:
function returnFunds returns funds to user
when all spots are reserved.
nodes.name: returnFunds

nodes.documentation: function reserveSpot allows user to reserve spots
nodes.name: reserveSpot

nodes.documentation: endGiveaway function which would be called only by Owner.
nodes.name: endGiveaway

nodes.documentation:
calculatePayout function.
this calls getEnergy function and
and takes a creates a 10% owner fee from energy
@return (ownerFee, payoutToWinner) - payouts to owner and winner
nodes.name: calculatePayout

nodes.documentation:
getWinner getter function. 
this calls getRandomNumber function and
finds the winner using players mapping
nodes.name: getWinner

nodes.documentation: getRandomNumber function, which finds the random number using counter.
nodes.name: getRandomNumber

nodes.documentation: resetGiveaway function resets giveaway and find the Winner.
nodes.name: resetGiveaway
